mapper.select: SELECT /* PaymentMapper.findAll */ PAYMENT_ID , MEMBER_ID , ORDER_ID , CLAIM_ID , AMOUNT , PAYMENT_METHOD , PAY_TYPE , PG_COMPANY , STATUS , ORDER_STATUS , TRANSACTION_ID , PAYMENT_DATE FROM PAYMENT

SELECT /* PaymentMapper.findByPaymentId */ PAYMENT_ID , MEMBER_ID , ORDER_ID , CLAIM_ID , AMOUNT , PAYMENT_METHOD , PAY_TYPE , PG_COMPANY , STATUS , ORDER_STATUS , TRANSACTION_ID , PAYMENT_DATE FROM PAYMENT WHERE PAYMENT_ID = #{paymentId}

SELECT /* PaymentMapper.findByOrderId */ PAYMENT_ID , MEMBER_ID , ORDER_ID , CLAIM_ID , AMOUNT , PAYMENT_METHOD , PAY_TYPE , PG_COMPANY , STATUS , ORDER_STATUS , TRANSACTION_ID , PAYMENT_DATE FROM PAYMENT WHERE ORDER_ID = #{orderId}
